short_summary: Business Transformation - Solution-based Informatics (Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement) Consulting and Implementation Services.
description: Shared Services Canada are inviting bids from SBIPS EN537-05IT01 Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the following domains of expertise
full_summary:
## Shared Services Canada – Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement

### Title and Reference Information

* Title: Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement—Domains of Expertise- Business Transformation – Technology Advisory – Implementation Services
* Reference Number: cb-7201-41404492
* Solicitation Number: R000134271
* Publication Date: 2023-07-13
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-11T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-09-11
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-12-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-11-30

### Notice and Invitation

Shared Services Canada (SSC) intends to award up to three contracts through a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement (SBIPS) EN537-05IT01. The procurement is restricted to Tier 2 Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified for services in the National Capital Region under the following domains of expertise:

* Business Transformation

### Contract Details

* Contract period: Three years, plus two option periods of one year each
* Security level: Secret
* Evaluation criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Selection process: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Notice type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Pre-Qualification and Invitation to Bid

The pre-qualified list of suppliers includes:

* Accenture Inc.
* ADAPTOVATE Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* Adobe Systems Canada Inc.
* ALITHYA CANADA INC
* BDO Canada LLP
* Bits In Glass Inc.
* Cache Computer Consulting Corp.
* CAE Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Canada Workday ULC
* CGI Information Systems and Management Consultants Inc.
* CIMA+ S.E.N.C.
* COMPUTACENTER TERAMACH INC.
* Computer Sciences Canada Inc.
* Deloitte Inc.
* DONNA CONNA INC., IBM CANADA LIMITED IN JOINT VENTURE
* Ernst & Young LLP
* ESIT Canada Enterprise Services Co.
* Fujitsu Consulting (CANADA) Inc.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* IBM Canada Limited
* IT/NET OTTAWA INC, KPMG LLP, in joint venture
* KPMG LLP
* Kyndryl Canada Limited; ISM Information Systems Management Corporation IN JOINT VENT
